Uses of Package
io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

  • Packages that use io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi 
    Package Description
    io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi  
    io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.effectbuilder  
    io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.tools  
  • Classes in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi used by io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi 
    Class and Description
    Aurora
    The primary class in the API.
    Aurora.Effects
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora effects information.
    Aurora.ExternalStreaming
    Contains methods for sending panel data to the Aurora very quickly.
    Aurora.PanelLayout
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora panel layout information.
    Aurora.Rhythm
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora Rhythm information.
    Aurora.Schedules
    Contains methods for managing schedules on the Aurora.
    Aurora.State
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora state information.
    AuroraMetadata
    An object for storing information related to an Aurora device.
    Color
    Represents a single color in an effect's palette.
    Effect
    A local interface for an Aurora effect.
    Effect.Direction
    The available effect direction types.
    Note: If a direction is missing, please create an issue on Github.
    Effect.Type
    The availbale effect types.
    Note: The plugin type is for user-made plugin effect types.
    Panel
    Represents a single Aurora light panel.
    Plugin
    A local interface for an Aurora plugin.
    PluginOptions
    A local interface for the plugin options belonging to a plugin.
    Position
    Represents a position on the Aurora panel grid.
    StatusCodeException
    A generic exception for an HTTP request error.
    StatusCodeException.ResourceNotFoundException
    Thrown when the Aurora controlller returns a 404 status code response.
    StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
    Thrown when the Aurora controller returns a 401 status code response.
    StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
    Thrown when the Aurora controlller returns a 422 status code response.
  • Classes in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi used by io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.effectbuilder 
    Class and Description
    Aurora
    The primary class in the API.
    Color
    Represents a single color in an effect's palette.
    Effect
    A local interface for an Aurora effect.
    Effect.Direction
    The available effect direction types.
    Note: If a direction is missing, please create an issue on Github.
    Frame
    Stores a frame's RGBW color and transition time.
    Panel
    Represents a single Aurora light panel.
    StatusCodeException
    A generic exception for an HTTP request error.
    StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
    Thrown when the Aurora controller returns a 401 status code response.
  • Classes in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi used by io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.tools 
    Class and Description
    AuroraMetadata
    An object for storing information related to an Aurora device.
    Effect
    A local interface for an Aurora effect.
    Frame
    Stores a frame's RGBW color and transition time.
    Panel
    Represents a single Aurora light panel.
    StatusCodeException
    A generic exception for an HTTP request error.
    StatusCodeException.InternalServerErrorException
    Thrown when the Aurora controlller returns a 500 status code response.
    StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
    Thrown when the Aurora controller returns a 401 status code response.
